Reviews.Title: “Excellent Apartment in a wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: Surfbeachrobina
Reviews.Content: We have just spent 4 days in Apartment 22, at La Rambla 102, organised through Aspasios Apartments - I pride myself on reviewing Tripadvisor and making this particular choice. This Apartment was right opposite the best food markets in this whole world, it was spotless, had a great view over the florist shops of La Rambla, and was close to absolutely everything. Really can't say much more - everything was there for us, and more reasonable in price than staying in hotels (I think) - my only negative - change that hairdryer - otherwise everything was absolutely perfect. Highly recommend it, and if were to get back to Barcelona - a most incredibly beautiful city, we would ask for this apartment again. Thanks Aspasios - it was great.

Reviews.Title: “This property nearly ruined our stay in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: rstrubin
Reviews.Content: My friends and I were so excited to rent an apartment in Barcelona for the 6 nights we were there. We made arrangements with the company about what time we would be arriving at the apartment and when they should meet us with the key. They were over an hour late, leaving 3 obviously foreign girls on a street corner with tons of luggage. We kept calling our contact, to no avail. The person who finally showed up informed us that our original contact had gotten too drunk watching football. We were annoyed but ok. Then comes the fun part. Our apartment (though listed as a 4th floor unit) was technically on the 6th. There was an elevator, that held one person at a time. Getting all of our things to the 6th floor was arduous to say the least. Once we got into the apartment, it looked old, nothing like the pictures on the internet. The man who let us in was very disorganized. We had to ask many questions (internet password, how to check out, etc). About an hour after getting settled the power went out and we could not see anything. We called the landlord who asked if it was okay if they came in the morning to check it out.... unacceptable. She eventually ended up coming (an hour later) and called the power company and had the power back on in 2 hours. While we appreciated that, she seemed annoyed and very put out to have to help us. The next day we were determined to start fresh and enjoy the city. Except the elevators didn't work at all. Going down was no big deal.... but up 6 flights of steep stairs, with groceries and souvenirs got old. Every time we wanted to come and go, we had to deal with this. The shower head floods the bathroom.We found a work around, but it meant standing in the corner hovering under the faucet which we had to place against the wall. I would in no way stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Central location, very good rental apartment”
Reviews.Author: AlexSiqueira
Reviews.Content: Tripadvisor classification of Apartments Aspasios is not adequate: in reality, it is not a hotel, but various rental apartments in different locations (services like bedroom cleaning, towels substitution etc, are not provided). My review refers to the Girona Design 1B apartment, where I stayed with my family (I, my wife, and 2 daughters - 1 adult and 1 children) from Jan 29th to Feb 2nd, 2012. It is constituted by 2 bedrooms, a living room with balcony, a kitchen (very well equiped, including also a washing machine) and a bathroom (shower only, no bathtub). Free wi-fi internet is provided, as well as a very useful safe in one bedroom. Location is very central (4 blocks from Plaza Catalunya), with easy walking access to various Barcelona main touristic atractions and to the public transport system. Apartments Aspasios personel was very helpful. I considered the overall experience as very pleasant and I'd certainly stay there again. It is worth to mention that there are accessibility restrictions to this apartment: if you need to use the lift, there are 4 steps from the building hall to the lift and the stair is somewhat tight. To end, I would strongly recommend to have a cell phone for contacts (as mentioned in maris09 review).

Reviews.Title: “very good apartment near the center of the city”
Reviews.Author: attelocin7
Reviews.Content: in the room it was everything we needed... the location is good (1km to pl.catalunya) so we visited all the city without any type of transport, but only by walk

Reviews.Title: “Gran Via A by Aspasios”
Reviews.Author: Jim M
Reviews.Content: We stayed for seven days in Apt Gran Via A and found our stay wonderful and stress free.The apartment was presented as advertized and was clean and stylish with plenty of space and privacy for a family of four (two parents and two teenagers) The Apartment is located in a genuine Modernisme Building and is centrally located for easy access to all the major sites in Barcelona and was a real treat to stay in !! We found the staff from Aspasios extremly professional and they made the whole experience a pleasure Highest reccomendation !!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice apartment, quiet and central.”
Reviews.Author: Gregor W
Reviews.Content: the apartment is located perfectly between Eixample and Born. Even though very central, it was very quiet. The neighborhood is very nice. The apartment is very stylish and perfectly equipped.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice apartment in a great location - highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: Annabella8899
Reviews.Content: The flat was very nicely decorated, all appliances in good order, very clean and complete with DVD player and internet. Convenient for family travelling, as we had 2 bedrooms, one master bedroom with (small) en-suite bathroom and a second with two single beds - quasi bunk-beds. We stayed in apt on the 4th floor, which had a nice view. Staff was helpful and spoke very good english both on the phone and when meeting us at the place. Thank you Jullietta. The only consideration is the very small elevator, which is hardly suitable for kids/buggies. Otherwise, beautiful place to stay, which we will gladly return to - fantastic location, walking distance to all major attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Great apartment, amazing location”
Reviews.Author: Martin S
Reviews.Content: I stayed at a beautiful apartment on Passeig de Sant Joan while I was in Barcelona working May-August. A rep (who spoke great English) met me at the apartment early in the morning right when I arrived to show me the apartment and answer any questions. They were always available and in contact whenever something arose. The apartment was slightly expensive but that's what you ask for in Barcelona; especially in spitting distance of the Arc d'Triomf. The weekly cleaning service was nice but mediocre and should be treated as a perk rather than a decision factor. The private owner of the apartment lived right next door and was extremely nice and helpful when I needed to receive mail or had any problem that Aspasios could not help with. All around, great experience and highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Great find!”
Reviews.Author: ploppyplop
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Girona Designs Apartments unit 2B which was a 2 bedroom. Stylish decor and 10min walk from Tetuan metro station. Master bedroom faces inner courtyard, other bedroom faces the streets. Windows were doubled glazed so you can hear no street noise anyway. Loved the facilities. Has washing machine, dryer, Nespresso machine, oven, dishwasher & all utensils you can think of! Provides a basic utilities cleaning kit (dishwashing liquid, cleaning cloths, bin bags but no clothes detergent, so do bring along some if you are staying). Toiletries (from Rituals!) and towels also provided. Had no problems with the lift, works great. Check-in was a breeze though the staff are not physically located there, just notify time ahead & someone will come over to check you in. Lovely place and will definitely stay again if I'm coming to Barcelona!

Reviews.Title: “Gran Via Suites 1 by Aspasios is Immaculate”
Reviews.Author: Caprioska
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Gran Via Suites 1, Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes 509. LOCATION: Awesome, because of the following: - Approx 100meters to Urgell station - 10min walk to Placa Espanya - 5min walk to Aerobus Bus stop - Catalunya is 2 stops away on the same subway line. FACILITIES:Perfect. - kettle, big fridge, electric stove, microwave, coffee maker - high speed internet - high tech washing machine, dryer. These are shared facilities in an easily accessible room. During our stay, not once did we had to wait for our turn, these machines were always available. CLEANLINESS:Immaculately clean. Judging by the spartan condition of the bed, cutlery, etc it seemed like they were just bought a day before we checked-in. They all looked new. QUIETNESS: The apartment is in a major street (Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes) but given that its on the 4th floor and the good quality windows, it was a peaceful apartment. SERVICE: Very professional. When we checked-in, a staff from the company Aspasios was there with all the paperwork, she explained everything thoroughly and clearly. As perpetual travellers we have stayed in several serviced apartments worldwide but Gran Via Suites and the service provided by Aspasios is the best. Highly, highly Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Very good!”
Reviews.Author: arniea68
Reviews.Content: The apartment is very central but yet very quiet. Near the Ciutadella Park and walking distance to the beach, which is very nice when not haveing a car. Also walking distance to the old town. The apartment is new and modern and overall we were very satisfied. Aspasios were very quick to respond whenever we needed assistance.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience”
Reviews.Author: ChrisDevos
Reviews.Content: We rented the aparment ARAGO GARDEN in Barcelona of company Aparments Aspasios. Everything about the apartment was great! Everything. It was just like in the pictures shown in the website. Classy, spacious, comfortable. The bath was a plus after a long walking day in the city. The kitchen also very big and with everything necessary to cook. The bedrooms ok as well and the living was really cozy. All the apartment great but the nicest thing was the terrace. Every breakfast and dinner we had it on the terrace and we loved it! Although we were in March the weather was feeling like summer and our son had the chance to play a lot outside and us we were happy to know he was in a safe environment (high wooden walls all around the terrace). By the way, the location was excellent (just one block from nearest metro station)and a few blocks from Paseo de Gracia, one of the nicest avenues of Barcelona with all the trendy shops.

Reviews.Title: “A few hassles but good accommodation”
Reviews.Author: famorganiser
Reviews.Content: We booked this apartment about 5 months before our stay - a 2 bedroom apartment in Gracia. A day before we were due to arrive, I recieved a call saying that there was a problem with our apartment and we would not be able to stay in it in the first night - our options were to spend one night in a one bedroom apartment and then transfer to the apartment we had intially booked, or to stay 3 nights in an apartment 10 minutes out of the centre. Not great options. We took the first. The only compensation they gave us was to transfer our bags to the second apartment on day 2. This messed up our stay in Barcelona - I would have expected a bit more for this mix up..Lycke who looked after us was very nice, but still we had to break up our day, move apartments etc - and we booked so long ago..surely double booking should not happen and I can only imagine they would do this if there was more money in it for them. The apartments were both lovely, clean and in good areas. The TV in the second apartment didnt work, which was only an issue for our 4 year old. If this mix up hadnt happened I would rate them highly, but service is so important when you only have a few days.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accomadation”
Reviews.Author: KarenLH10
Reviews.Content: This apartment was excellent! The staff were super friendly, helpful and professional. The location was perfect, with a park only half a block away. Shopping and a little market just over a block away and the metro about 4 blocks away. You are also only about 10 blocks from FC Barcelona stadium. It was perfect.

HotelInfo.Name: Apartaments Aspasios
HotelInfo.Address: Ronda de Sant Pere, 39, 08010 Barcelona, Spain
